description: Try our easy to follow White Chocolate Pancakes with Raspberry Coulis recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: White Chocolate Pancakes with Raspberry Coulis Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.25 cup So Good Regular soy milk
6 scoop So Good Bliss frozen dessert

recipeInstructions.text: Place raspberries in a food processor and blend until smooth. Set aside.
Place flours and white chocolate in a bowl. Mix together eggs, soy milk and vanilla. Fold into dry mix.
Heat a non-stick frying pan and spray lightly with oil. Add 2 tbs of pancake mixture and cook for 1-2 minutes. Flip and cook for a further 30 seconds. Repeat with remaining mixture.
Serve pancakes with raspberry coulis and So Good Bliss Frozen Dessert.
